017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_INIGroupMissing;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_INIKeyMissing;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_INIPathMissing;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingStringConverter;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.ALLOWS_INIFILE;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_INIFile;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ReadLock;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_WriteLock;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.THROW_CAUGHT_LOCALLY;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.createSuppressWarningsAnnotation;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.JavaUtils.composeGetterName;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Template.hasVariables;
040
041import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.nio.file.Files;
044import java.nio.file.Path;
045import java.util.LinkedList;
046import java.util.Map;
047import java.util.Optional;
048
049import org.apiguardian.api.API;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
051import org.tquadrat.foundation.ap.CodeGenerationError;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.prefs.PreferencesException;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.inifile.INIFile;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
055import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants;
056import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Lazy;
057import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Template;
058import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.PathStringConverter;
059
060/**
061 *  The
062 *  {@linkplain org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder code builder implementation}
063 *  that connects the configuration bean to
064 *  {@link INIFile},
065 *  as defined in
066 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.INIBeanSpec}.
067 *
068 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
069 *  @version $Id: INIBeanBuilder.java 1015 2022-02-09 08:25:36Z tquadrat $
070 *  @UMLGraph.link
071 *  @since 0.1.0
072 */
073@SuppressWarnings( "OverlyCoupledClass" )
074@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIBeanBuilder.java 1015 2022-02-09 08:25:36Z tquadrat $" )
075@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.1.0" )
076public final class INIBeanBuilder extends CodeBuilderBase
077{
078        /*---------------*\
079    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
080        \*---------------*/
081    /**
082     *  The various types for the initialisation of the field holding the
083     *  backing
084     *  {@link Path}
085     *  for the
086     *  {@link INIFile}
087     *  instance.
088     *
089     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
090     *  @version $Id: INIBeanBuilder.java 1015 2022-02-09 08:25:36Z tquadrat $
091     *  @UMLGraph.link
092     *  @since 0.1.0
093     */
094    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: INIBeanBuilder.java 1015 2022-02-09 08:25:36Z tquadrat $" )
095    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
096    private static enum InitType
097    {
098        /**
099         *  The given filename denotes an absolute path.
100         */
101        INIT_ABSOLUTE,
102
103        /**
104         *  The given filename starts  with {@code $USER} and stands for a path
105         *  that is to be resolved against the user's home folder.
106         */
107        INIT_HOME,
108
109        /**
110         *  The given filename starts with <code>${â¦}</code> and stands for a
111         *  path that will be resolved against a property.
112         */
113        INIT_PROPERTY,
114
115        /**
116         *  The given filename will be resolved against the current working
117         *  directory.
118         */
119        INIT_CWD
120    }
121    //  enum InitType
122
123        /*--------------*\
124    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
125        \*--------------*/
126    /**
127     *  Creates a new instance of {@code INIBeanBuilder}.
128     *
129     *  @param  context The code generator context.
130     */
131    public INIBeanBuilder( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
132    {
133        super( context );
134    }   //  INIBeanBuilder()
135
136        /*---------*\
137    ====** Methods **==========================================================
138        \*---------*/
139    /**
140     *  {@inheritDoc}
141     */
142    @Override
143    public final void build()
144    {
145        //---* Parse the filename for the INIFile *----------------------------
146        final InitType initType;
147        final Path iniFilePath;
148        String propertyName = null;
149        final var rawINIFilePath = getConfiguration().getINIFilePath()
150            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( MSG_INIPathMissing ) );
151
152        if( rawINIFilePath.startsWith( "$USER" ) )
153        {
154            initType = InitType.INIT_HOME;
155            iniFilePath = PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.fromString( rawINIFilePath.substring( 5 ) );
156        }
157        else if( rawINIFilePath.startsWith( "${" ) && hasVariables( rawINIFilePath ) )
158        {
159            initType = InitType.INIT_PROPERTY;
160            final var template = new Template( rawINIFilePath );
161            final var variables = new LinkedList<>( template.findVariables() );
162            propertyName = variables.get( 0 );
163            iniFilePath = PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.fromString( template.replaceVariable( Map.of( propertyName, EMPTY_STRING ) ) );
164        }
165        else
166        {
167            iniFilePath = PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.fromString( rawINIFilePath );
168            if( iniFilePath.isAbsolute() )
169            {
170                initType = InitType.INIT_ABSOLUTE;
171            }
172            else
173            {
174                initType = InitType.INIT_CWD;
175            }
176        }
177
178        /*
179         * Add the method that retrieves the path for the file that backs the
180         * INIFile.
181         */
182        final var retrievePathBuilder = getComposer().methodBuilder( "retrieveINIFilePath" )
183            .addModifiers( PRIVATE, FINAL )
184            .addJavadoc(
185                """
186                Returns the path for the INIFile backing file.
187                """, ExceptionInInitializerError.class
188            )
189            .returns( Path.class,
190                """
191                The path for the file that backs the {@code INIFile} instance.\
192                """ )
193            .addCode( switch( initType )
194                {
195                    case INIT_CWD -> getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
196                        .addStatement( "final var retValue = $1T.of( $2S, $3S ).toAbsolutePath()", Path.class, ".", PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.toString( iniFilePath ) )
197                        .build();
198                    case INIT_HOME -> getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
199                        .addStatement( "final var retValue = $1T.of( getProperty( PROPERTY_USER_HOME ), $2S ).toAbsolutePath()", Path.class, PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.toString( iniFilePath ) )
200                        .addStaticImport( System.class, "getProperty" )
201                        .addStaticImport( CommonConstants.class, "PROPERTY_USER_HOME" )
202                        .build();
203                    case INIT_ABSOLUTE -> getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
204                        .addStatement( "final var retValue = $1T.of( $2S ).toAbsolutePath()", Path.class, PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.toString( iniFilePath ) )
205                        .build();
206                    case INIT_PROPERTY -> getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
207                        .addStatement( "final var basePath = $1L().toAbsolutePath()", composeGetterName( propertyName ) )
208                        .addStatement( "final var retValue = basePath.resolve( $1S ).toAbsolutePath()", PathStringConverter.INSTANCE.toString( iniFilePath ) )
209                        .build();
210                } )
211            .addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() );
212        final var retrievePathMethod = retrievePathBuilder.build();
213        addMethod( retrievePathMethod );
214
215        //---* Add the method that creates the INIFile instance *--------------
216        final var createINIFileBuilder = getComposer().methodBuilder( "createINIFile" )
217            .addModifiers( PRIVATE, FINAL )
218            .addAnnotation( createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), THROW_CAUGHT_LOCALLY ) )
219            .addJavadoc(
220                """
221                Creates the
222                {@link INIFile}
223                instance that is connected with this configuration bean.
224                
225                @throws $T Something went wrong on creating/opening the INI file.\
226                """, ExceptionInInitializerError.class
227            )
228            .returns( INIFile.class,
229                """
230                The {@code INIFile} instance.\
231                """ )
232            .addException( ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
233            .addStatement( "final $T retValue", INIFile.class )
234            .addStatement( "final var path = $N()", retrievePathMethod )
235            .beginControlFlow(
236                """
237                    try
238                    """
239            );
240        if( getConfiguration().getINIFileMustExist() )
241        {
242            createINIFileBuilder.beginControlFlow(
243                    """
244                    if( !exists( path ) )
245                    """
246                )
247                .addStaticImport( Files.class, "exists" )
248                .addStatement( "throw new $1T( path.toString() )", FileNotFoundException.class )
249                .endControlFlow()
250                .addStatement( "retValue = $1T.open( path )", INIFile.class );
251        }
252        else
253        {
254            final var fileComment = getConfiguration().getINIFileComment();
255            if( fileComment.isPresent() )
256            {
257                createINIFileBuilder.addStatement(
258                    """
259                    final var isNew = !exists( path )\
260                    """ )
261                    .addStaticImport( Files.class, "exists" )
262                    .addStatement( "retValue = $T.open( path )", INIFile.class )
263                    .beginControlFlow(
264                        """
265                        if( isNew )
266                        """ )
267                    .addStatement( "retValue.addComment( $S )", fileComment.get() )
268                    .endControlFlow();
269            }
270            else
271            {
272                createINIFileBuilder.addStatement(
273                    """
274                    retValue = $1T.open( path )\
275                    """, INIFile.class );
276            }
277        }
278        createINIFileBuilder.nextControlFlow(
279            """
280            
281            catch( final $T e )
282            """, IOException.class )
283            .addStatement( "throw new $T( e )", ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
284            .endControlFlow()
285            .addCode( "\n" )
286            .addComment( "Sets the structure of the INIFile" );
287        for( final var group : getConfiguration().getINIGroups().entrySet() )
288        {
289            createINIFileBuilder.beginControlFlow(
290                    """
291                    if( !retValue.hasGroup( $S ) )
292                    """, group.getKey()
293                )
294                .addStatement( "retValue.addComment( $S, $S )", group.getKey(), group.getValue() )
295                .endControlFlow();
296        }
297        PropertiesLoop:
298        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
299        for( var i = getConfiguration().propertyIterator(); i.hasNext(); )
300        {
301            final var property = i.next();
302
303            if( !property.hasFlag( ALLOWS_INIFILE ) ) continue PropertiesLoop;
304            if( property.getINIComment().isEmpty() ) continue PropertiesLoop;
305            final var group = property.getINIGroup().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_INIGroupMissing, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
306            final var key = property.getINIKey().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_INIKeyMissing, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
307            final var comment = property.getINIComment().orElseThrow();
308            createINIFileBuilder.beginControlFlow(
309                    """
310                     if( !retValue.hasValue( $S, $S ) )
311                     """, group, key
312                )
313                .addStatement( "retValue.addComment( $S, $S, $S )", group, key, comment )
314                .endControlFlow();
315        }   //  PropertiesLoop:
316
317        final var createINIFile = createINIFileBuilder.addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() )
318            .build();
319        addMethod( createINIFile );
320
321        //---* Add the field for the INI file *--------------------------------
322        final var iniFileClass = ParameterizedTypeName.from( Lazy.class, INIFile.class );
323        final var iniFile = getComposer().fieldBuilder( iniFileClass, STD_FIELD_INIFile.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
324            .addJavadoc(
325                """
326                The INIFile instance that is used by this configuration bean to
327                persist (some of) its properties.
328                """
329            )
330            .build();
331        addField( STD_FIELD_INIFile, iniFile );
332
333        //---* Initialise the INI file *---------------------------------------
334        final var constructorCode = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
335            .add(
336                """
337                    
338                //---* Initialise the INI file *----------------------------------------
339                """
340            )
341            .addStatement( "$1N = $2T.use( this::$3N )", iniFile, Lazy.class, createINIFile )
342            .build();
343        addConstructorCode( constructorCode );
344
345        //---* Create the method that returns the INIFile *--------------------
346        final var returnType = ParameterizedTypeName.from( Optional.class, INIFile.class );
347        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( "obtainINIFile" )
348            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
349            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
350            .returns( returnType )
351            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
352            .addStatement( "return $T.of( $N.get() )", Optional.class, iniFile )
353            .build();
354        addMethod( method );
355
356        //---* The builder for the code of the loadINIFile() method *----------
357        final var loadCodeBuilder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder();
358        if( isSynchronized() )
359        {
360            loadCodeBuilder.beginControlFlow(
361                """
362                try( final var ignore = $N.lock() )
363                """, getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ) );
364        }
365        else
366        {
367            loadCodeBuilder.beginControlFlow(
368                """
369                try
370                """ );
371        }
372        loadCodeBuilder.addStatement( "final var iniFile = $1N.get()", iniFile )
373            .addStatement( "iniFile.refresh()" )
374            .add(
375                """
376                
377                /*
378                 * Load the data.
379                 */
380                """
381            );
382
383        //---* The builder for the code of the updateINIFile() method *--------
384        final var updateCodeBuilder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder();
385        if( isSynchronized() )
386        {
387            updateCodeBuilder.beginControlFlow(
388                """
389                try( final var ignore = $N.lock() )
390                """, getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock ) );
391        }
392        else
393        {
394            updateCodeBuilder.beginControlFlow(
395                """
396                try
397                """ );
398        }
399        updateCodeBuilder.addStatement( "final var iniFile = $1N.get()", iniFile )
400            .add(
401            """
402            
403            /*
404             * Write the data.
405             */
406            """
407        );
408
409        //---* Process the properties *----------------------------------------
410        PropertiesLoop:
411        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
412        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
413        {
414            final var propertySpec = i.next();
415            /*
416             * Skip the properties that do not have a tie to the INI file.
417             */
418            if( !propertySpec.hasFlag( ALLOWS_INIFILE ) ) continue PropertiesLoop;
419
420            final var name = propertySpec.getPropertyName();
421            final var group = propertySpec.getINIGroup().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_INIGroupMissing, name ) ) );
422            final var key = propertySpec.getINIKey().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_INIKeyMissing, name ) ) );
423            final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
424            final var stringConverterType = propertySpec.getStringConverterClass()
425                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverter, name ) ) );
426            final var stringConverterCode =
427                switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverterType, propertySpec.isEnum() ) )
428                {
429                    case BY_INSTANCE -> getComposer().statementOf( "final var stringConverter = $T.INSTANCE", stringConverterType );
430                    case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> getComposer().statementOf( "final var stringConverter = new $T()", stringConverterType );
431                    case AS_ENUM -> getComposer().statementOf( "final var stringConverter = new $1T( $2T.class )", stringConverterType, propertySpec.getPropertyType() );
432                };
433
434            //---* Load the value *--------------------------------------------
435            loadCodeBuilder.beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING )
436                .add( stringConverterCode )
437                .addStatement( "$1N = iniFile.getValue( $2S, $3S, stringConverter ).orElse( $1N )", field, group, key )
438                .endControlFlow();
439
440            //---* Write the value *-------------------------------------------
441            updateCodeBuilder.beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING )
442                .add( stringConverterCode )
443                .addStatement( "iniFile.setValue( $2S, $3S, $1N, stringConverter )", field, group, key )
444                .endControlFlow();
445        }   //  PropertiesLoop:
446
447        //---* Create the loadINIFile() method *-------------------------------
448        loadCodeBuilder.nextControlFlow(
449            """
450
451            catch( final $T e )
452            """, IOException.class )
453            .addStatement( "throw new $T( e )", PreferencesException.class )
454            .endControlFlow();
455        final var loadMethod = getComposer().methodBuilder( "loadINIFile" )
456            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
457            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
458            .returns( VOID )
459            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
460            .addCode( loadCodeBuilder.build() )
461            .build();
462        addMethod( loadMethod );
463
464        //---* Create the updateINIFile() method *-----------------------------
465        updateCodeBuilder.add( "\n" )
466            .addStatement( "iniFile.save()" )
467            .nextControlFlow(
468                """
469
470                catch( final $T e )
471                """, IOException.class )
472            .addStatement( "throw new $T( e )", PreferencesException.class )
473            .endControlFlow();
474        final var updateMethod = getComposer().methodBuilder( "updateINIFile" )
475            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
476            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
477            .returns( VOID )
478            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
479            .addCode( updateCodeBuilder.build() )
480            .build();
481        addMethod( updateMethod );
482    }   //  build()
483}
484//  class INIBeanBuilder
485
486/*
487 *  End of File
488 */
